body_text: Would it make more sense to mock/stub TelemetryEnvironment with sinon and then just check that we're calling TelemetryEnvironment when the experiments get added?
body: Would it make more sense to mock/stub TelemetryEnvironment with sinon and then just check that we're calling TelemetryEnvironment when the experiments get added?
